name: Iron Orc Paddlers
description: Three warriors have been summoned by the worlds most powerful sorcerers. Only one warrior can be channeled at a time, but they can exchange at any time. Each excels in a certain kind of combat. You will need to use all three to beat the Iron Orcs. While each warrior has their strengths, they also have their weaknesses. Care must be taken by the player to consider the weaknesses of each warrior, and look at the other side of the coin.
